I have at least 1 gallon of water per day on-hand for the next 2 weeks.
I have sufficient food to last me for the next 2 weeks.
I have sufficient toiletries on hand for at least 30 days.
My vehicle's fuel tanks are kept above 50% full.
I own at least one firearm.
I have at least 30 rounds of ammo for each firearm.
I have at least 90 days supply of essential medications on-hand.
My back-up generator is protected and well-maintained.
Spending time cooped up with my family is not going to kill me.
The preceding statements apply for each member of my household.
